snippet: Jack D. Hidary is preparing to officially unveil his candidacy on Wednesday after hiring a team of political heavyweights with his personal fortune.
abstract: Jack D Hidary, wealthy and well-connected technology executive, prepares to officially unveil his candidacy for New York City mayor; says he will dip into his personal fortune to pay for a high-caliber campaign team, which includes Joe Trippi, who oversaw Howard Dean's Democratic run for the White House, as his top adviser.

byline.original: By MICHAEL BARBARO and MICHAEL M. GRYNBAUM

lead_paragraph: Jack D. Hidary is preparing to officially unveil his candidacy on Wednesday after hiring a team of political heavyweights with his personal fortune.

headline.main: In Style of Bloomberg, Wealthy Technology Executive Will Enter Mayor’s Race
headline.print_headline: In Style of Bloomberg, Wealthy Technology Executive Will Enter Mayor’s Race
